name: Shape (yorimashi)
description:
Welcome to my game page

This is a small game i made, feel free to enjoy it

**Game desc**

Point:

    Point always lose 0.125 in 0.25 second

    If you point = -10 -> You death

    and if you point = 5 -> You win 

Enemy:

  

If you don't dash when you attacking the enemy, you will lose 1 point and when you attacking with it with dash, +1.25 for you

so try to spam "Z" as much as you can, ka ka

Items:

Heal items (+ 2 point when you attacking enemy with dash)

  Reset items (Reset your point to zero)

  Stopoint items (Basically it will stop your point always minus in 3 second)

  Stop times items (ZA WARUDO in 3 second)

You can donate to me so i can make good project

Enjoy!~
